creditline: Gift of Elizabeth and Lloyd Olson in memory of Selma Groethe
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Two-panel tzute; white ground with red, blue, white and ixcaco warp stripes; each panel has double-eagle mothis at center with one row of birds and zoomorphic figures above and below; supplementary weft patterning in yellow, pink, greens, black, purple and red.
title: Cloth (tzute)
